properties.name: allow_multi_transactions
properties.description: Allow user to create new transaction while previous one is pending.

properties.name: product_id
properties.description: The product id that will be sent to Nuvei.

properties.name: merchant_site_name
properties.description: The merchant’s site name. That will be sent to Nuvei.

properties.name: challenge_preference
properties.description: Determines the challenge preference. 01 – Challenge requested, 02 – Exemption requested, 03 – No preference

properties.name: merchant_name
properties.description: The merchant name, as is displayed for the transaction on the consumer’s card statement.(String, 25)

properties.name: merchant_phone
properties.description: The merchant contact information, as is displayed for the transaction on the consumer’s card statement. It can also be an email address.(String, 13)

properties.name: product_id
properties.description: A free text field used to identify the product/service sold..(String, 50)

properties.name: upos_mid
properties.description: The merchant ID to use for retrieving user payment options

properties.name: upos_sid
properties.description: The merchant site ID to use for retrieving user payment options

properties.name: upos_mkey
properties.description: The merchant secret key to use for retrieving user payment options

properties.name: upos_hash_algorithm
properties.description: The merchant hash algorithm to use for checksum calculation
